types:type.name: requestJson

{"typeId": "int"}, store_id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, taxvat: String, website_id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, addresses: Array<{| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, customer_id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, {"typeId": "int"}, extension_attributes: {| company_attributes: {| customer_id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, company_id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, job_title: String, status: Number {"typeId": "int"},
